query: Responsive Navbar with navigation links, logo, dark mode toggle, and wallet connect button using Shadcn/Radix UI components
Footer component with branding and responsive layout using TailwindCSS
Hero section with title, description, and primary call-to-action button styled with Shadcn UI
Card component for displaying token information (name, symbol, total supply, user balance) with actions
Form component for token operations (transfer) with inputs and submit button
Full-screen game canvas container for Race page with overlay controls and responsive styling
Game over modal/dialog component summarizing score and coins collected, with action buttons
Trivia question modal/dialog component with radio-group options and submit button using Radix UI Dialog
Leaderboard table or list component displaying top players' addresses, scores, and coins, with responsive layout
Toast notification provider and hook using Shadcn UI Toast components
Skeleton loader component for content placeholders using Shadcn UI Skeleton
Spinner or loading indicator component using Radix UI Spinner
Button component with variants (primary, secondary, outline, ghost) using Shadcn UI
Input component with variants (default, outline, with icon) and validation states using Shadcn UI
Card component for generic use with header, content, and footer slots
Container component for responsive page padding and max-width
Typography components (Heading, Paragraph, Text) with consistent fonts and sizes
Dark mode toggle switch component
Alert component for displaying inline error or status messages
Tooltip component for additional info on hover using Radix UI Tooltip
Popover component for contextual menus or settings using Radix UI Popover
Avatar component representing user or placeholder icon
Badge component for labeling stats or statuses
Modal wrapper component for generic modals using Radix UI Dialog
